data.title: MASTER TOUCH EPOXY COATINGS
data.meta_description: We provide the best flooring solutions on the market. From durable Epoxy Flakes to stunning Metallic Marble floors.
data.text:
Welcome to Master Touch Epoxy Coatings, your premier destination for high performance decorative coatings and epoxy flooring solutions.

We provide the best flooring solutions on the market. From durable Epoxy Flakes to stunning Metallic Marble floors, we offer a wide range of products and flooring systems to suit every taste and lifestyle. Our dedicated coatings contractors are here to guide you through the selection process, ensuring you find the perfect flooring solution for your Commercial or Residential space.

Serving the entire Central Valley and beyond.

(Lic. #100279)

As epoxy specialists, we are dedicated to providing you with reliable, professional service to meet all your needs.

Garage Epoxy Flakes provide a durable and visually appealing coating for garage floors with decorative flakes.

Metallic Marble Epoxy offers a luxurious and distinctive marble-like finish for various surfaces.

Concrete Polishing involves refining and smoothing concrete surfaces to achieve a glossy and sleek appearance.

Countertop Epoxy provides a customizable and durable coating solution, enhancing and transforming countertops with a seamless and stylish finish.

Bathtub Epoxy offers a resilient and customizable coating, providing a durable and aesthetically pleasing solution for refinishing and transforming bathtubs.

David is great to work with! Our flooring looks so good, we are blown away by the quality of their work. Will recommend!

-Andrea F.

Wow! David and his team were amazing! On time, professional, quick, with quality workmanship. Our new epoxy floor is all we dreamed it would be and more. Thank you so much!

-Jake K.

Master Touch was fantastic to work with! Great customer service, and very helpful and informative every step of the way! We are very pleased with our new countertops.

We highly recommend them! 5 stars!

-Irene S.

Have a question? We are here to help.
